author: Siobhán O'Grady, Isabelle Khurshudyan, Sudarsan Raghavan, Kostiantyn Khudov
title: Russia says attacks not hitting civilians. Scenes in cities tell a different story.
description: The number of civilian casualties in Ukraine remains unclear, but the Russian attacks are increasingly hitting populated areas.
content:
In maps, videos and photos: How Russia's invasion is unfolding in Ukraine
Total numbers of civilian casualties in Ukraine remain unclear with no comprehensive figures released by Ukraines government… [+5894 chars]
